name: Fairy's Memoria
text:
As this card enters your magic stone area, you may reveal a Fairy from your hand. If you don't, this card enters your magic stone area rested.
T: Produce W.
T: Produce W, R, U, G, or B. Spend that will only to play Fairy resonators.
W, T: Target Fairy resonator gains [+200/+200] until end of turn.
